title: $569 -- San Juan, Puerto Rico: 3-Night Vacations
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $569 -- San Juan, Puerto Rico: 3-Night Vacations $569 -- San Juan, Puerto Rico: 3-Night Vacations by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - October 5, 2015 at 3:35 PM Tweet 
Puerto Rico is a great place for a quick escape without needing a passport to get there. Pleasant Holidays' offer discounts three-night vacation packages to the "51st State" from $569 per person. What's more, kids 17 and under stay for free. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from Boston; other departure cities are available at varying rates Three nights at the Sheraton Puerto Rico Hotel & Casino in San Juan Kids 17 and under stay free $75 food and beverage credit Free Wi-Fi Airline taxes and fuel surcharges 
How to get this deal: Visit Pleasant Holidays ' website. Travel at these rates is valid from Boston. Other departure cities are available. The offer provider hasn't listed a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
